get_queryset()[源代码]

Get the list of items for this view. This must be an iterable, and may be a queryset. Defaults to using self.queryset.

This method should always be used rather than accessing self.queryset directly, as self.queryset gets evaluated only once, and those results are cached for all subsequent requests.

You may want to override this if you need to provide different querysets depending on the incoming request.

(Eg. return a list of items that is specific to the user)

1.2.1.2. 区块链存证相关功能

@File : blockchain_evidence.py @Author : xixiaoyu @Time : 2022/4/6 4:30 下午 @Description :

class client.apis.v1_1_0.blockchain_evidence.BlockchainEvidenceListAPIView(**kwargs)[源代码]

基类：rest_framework.generics.ListAPIView

区块链存证 获取企业id，不管是哪种类型企业，获取与所在企业相关的存证信息， 包括 开出去的 、转出去的、接收的 融资的 融资接受的所有确权关联数据 按照日期倒排

Constructor. Called in the URLconf; can contain helpful extra keyword arguments, and other things.

1.2.1.6. 合同协议

@File : contract.py @Author : niuxingjie @Time : 2022/4/12 17:17 @Description :

class client.apis.v1_1_0.contract.ContractFileRetrieveAPIView(**kwargs)[源代码]

基类：rest_framework.generics.RetrieveAPIView

合同下载附件文件接口：

  • 根据合同的id来下载"单个付款承诺函.pdf"或者"协议附件压缩包.zip"

Constructor. Called in the URLconf; can contain helpful extra keyword arguments, and other things.

get_queryset()[源代码]
过滤条件：

  • 已确权的

  • 当前该机构发起或接收的

lookup_url_kwarg = 'pk'
permission_classes = [<class 'client.client_permissions.XLetterContractAgreementPermission'>]
retrieve(request, *args, **kwargs)[源代码]
下载次协议关联的文件：

  • 单个付款承诺函pdf

  • 打包后的单个协议zip压缩包

注意：

  • 如果发生了合同协议的原始内容source_content存在，但是没有上传至阿里云oss的文件信息content为空，可以到django admin后台手动生成。

Constructor. Called in the URLconf; can contain helpful extra keyword arguments, and other things.

filterset_class

:py:class:`client.filters.financing.FinanceProjectFilter`的别名

get_queryset()[源代码]

查询相关融资项目数据 一般企业/核心企业经办人角色可查，数据为本企业融资项目数据，本期不做数据权限隔离。 资金机构经办人角色可查，数据为本机构涉及融资项目数据，本期不做数据权限隔离。详见prd文档

列表数据按照项目立项时间倒排,即: 按sign_contract_at倒排 :return:

基类：rest_framework.views.APIView

忘记密码

Constructor. Called in the URLconf; can contain helpful extra keyword arguments, and other things.

authentication_classes = []
permission_classes = []
post(request)[源代码]

对前端传来的数据进行校验 首先把数据进行序列化校验， 检验通过后进行密码校验 验证通过进行更新密码

class client.apis.v1_1_0.user.UserResetPasswordAPI(**kwargs)[源代码]

基类：rest_framework.views.APIView

修改密码 首先需要token 回显用户数据，手机号不可更改 校验图形验证码、短信验证码、密码 然后更新数据

Constructor. Called in the URLconf; can contain helpful extra keyword arguments, and other things.

permission_classes = []
